name: Heavy Strike (In Effect)
description:
Character's next Normal Attack in this Round deals +1 DMG.
When this Normal Attack is a Charged Attack: Deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: Character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> in this Round deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a $[K51]:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionreplaced: Character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> in this Round deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.
